content: bambo o sti tch dish cloth materials needed lilly sugar n cream yarn in color swimming pool 100% cotton medium 4 weight 65 yards size 7 4 50 mm knitting needles 2 stitch markers optional for garter edge 1 lockable stitch marker for marking front of work tapestry needle and scissors note pattern length can be adjusted by continuing to do more repeats end with final row repeat when you come to desired length to adjust width calculate the number of stitches in increments of 2 + 6 directions set up row cast on 44 k across for 3 row th is written pattern can be used with the video tutorial on the pattern handmade by stacy j youtube channel it s a beginner friendly knit pattern that only uses knit purl and yarn over while slipping a stitch use lockable stitch marker to mark rs / insert stitch markers aft er beg th ere is also a row by row checklist to help you with keeping track k3 and before ending k3 carry them up the work until fi nal row enjoy 1 rs k3 *yo k2 pass yo over k2 repeat from * until 3 sts remain k3 2 ws k3 p across until 3 sts remain k3 tutorial available on youtube at https //youtu be/6-gagti5av4 3 repeat row 1-2 sixteen more times or until piece measures 8 diffi culty level easy / beginner final row measures 8 5 x 8 5 / gauge not important but if you knit loose k across for 3 row you will use more yarn bind off knit wise and weave in ends stitches used knit k purl p yarn over yo ©2020 handmade by stacy j row #
